title: Get lifetime access to 1,000-plus career-building courses for $19.97
description: Get lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited for just $19.97. You can learn coding, marketing, music, investing and more. (via Cult of Mac - Your source for the latest Apple news, rumors, analysis, reviews, how-tos and deals.)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Get lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited for just $19.97. You can learn coding, marketing, music, investing and more.
text: Deals Want to learn coding, marketing, music, investing or something else entirely? Get a lifetime pass to a bigger brain with StackSkills Unlimited. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals StackSkills has a news flash for anyone who got a little too comfortable after high school: It’s not smart to stop learning. That’s especially true in this accelerated stage of the information age, where new tech skills are increasingly in demand. The good news is that it’s easier than ever to catch up to the needs of today’s job market, thanks to resources like StackSkills. This vast platform for online education can help anyone chart a path to a new career. And lifetime subscriptions cost just $19.97 (regularly $600). StackSkills: Educate and graduate on your own time If you’ve never tried to pick up a new skill online, you’ll be amazed at the sheer volume that StackSkills offers. Subscribers gain lifetime access to a library spanning more than 1,000 courses, with new lessons added each month. Subjects run the gamut from day trading to dog training, with entire curricula devoted to subjects like personal finance, project management and marketing. And yes, there’s a huge focus on programming, app development and other coding skills. Learn at your own pace, with courses from top instructors Rated 4.6/5 stars on Trustpilot, these courses let you learn at your own pace. And many of them serve as study guides for the latest tech certifications. They’re taught by more than 350 of the internet’s top instructors, and you can chart your progress right on the StackSkills site. You can even use StackSkills for continuing education once you’re on the job, with new courses added as software and certification requirements evolve. Save on a lifetime subcription to StackSkills Unlimited For a limited time, you can gain lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited for $19.97. That’s a 96% discount off the list price of $600. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this post on StackSkills Unlimited on October 5, 2023. We updated the pricing.
html:
• Deals

StackSkills has a news flash for anyone who got a little too comfortable after high school: It’s not smart to stop learning. That’s especially true in this accelerated stage of the information age, where new tech skills are increasingly in demand.

The good news is that it’s easier than ever to catch up to the needs of today’s job market, thanks to resources like StackSkills. This vast platform for online education can help anyone chart a path to a new career. And lifetime subscriptions cost just $19.97 (regularly $600).

StackSkills: Educate and graduate on your own time

If you’ve never tried to pick up a new skill online, you’ll be amazed at the sheer volume that StackSkills offers. Subscribers gain lifetime access to a library spanning more than 1,000 courses, with new lessons added each month.

Subjects run the gamut from day trading to dog training, with entire curricula devoted to subjects like personal finance, project management and marketing. And yes, there’s a huge focus on programming, app development and other coding skills.

Learn at your own pace, with courses from top instructors

Rated 4.6/5 stars on Trustpilot, these courses let you learn at your own pace. And many of them serve as study guides for the latest tech certifications. They’re taught by more than 350 of the internet’s top instructors, and you can chart your progress right on the StackSkills site.

You can even use StackSkills for continuing education once you’re on the job, with new courses added as software and certification requirements evolve.

Save on a lifetime subcription to StackSkills Unlimited

For a limited time, you can gain lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited for $19.97. That’s a 96% discount off the list price of $600.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this post on StackSkills Unlimited on October 5, 2023. We updated the pricing.
